title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Currently, there are multiple redraws occurring during text changes with word wrap enabled. This can be observed when performing the steps below.
EB: Ideally, there should only be one redraw for each visible line during text changes with word wrap enabled.
SR:
1. Open the application and enable word wrap in the settings.
2. Enter some text in the StyledText component.
3. Observe the number of redraws that occur during the text change.
